title: test
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing, native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: welcome
contents:
The R-Govys blog is a place for R-Govys users to post write-ups on topics of interest to the group. Suggestions:
Example of using R in your work
Example of a new R feature or package
Discussion of changes in how R is used in government
Write-up of a meeting review or summary
